Author: paraphrasis
Text: This is some of the restaurants I used to frequent when I lived in London.  I know that Wetherspoons and Itsu have calories on the actual menus, but the rest you might have to find online (if you have internet?)  **Wagamama** (japanese/south-east asian food)   **Wetherspoons** \- Restaurant chain with calories on the menu (most is high calorie though, but you can find something reasonable)   **Prezzo** \- an italian chain restaurant.   **Itsu** \- Japanese/sushi chain   **The real greek** \- greek food   **Tossed** \- Salad bar, they have a nutritional calculator online   **Gourmet Burger Kitchen** for burgers   For "dessert", **Yogland** has nutritional info for their frozen yoghurt per 100g.
